titles.title: Depressed Smaller Cities Improvement Act of 1993
To establish an interagency task force to conduct a study regarding the problems affecting smaller cities in the United States and recommend actions to alleviate such problems.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources and Intergovernmental Relations.

bill.summary: 6/17/1993--Introduced. Depressed Smaller Cities Improvement Act of 1993 - Establishes the Interagency Task Force on Depressed Smaller Cities to study problems affecting depressed smaller cities and to determine the proper scope and extent of Federal assistance and programs to reduce the problems affecting such cities. Authorizes appropriations.
